data.text: @mummyJo46 Not sure I’m the right person to ask. The novelty of looking after me has already worn off. Apparently cooking was boring. 😂
@AlimentaryBites Mmmm looks lovely! Any tips on how to get a 21 & 17 to offer to cook would be gratefully received! 😀
@AlimentaryBites @beckyexcell Yorkies, you can’t really go wrong! 😁
@AlexanderSHdb WOW!!! They look amazing! When are we doing a trade? 😂
@AlimentaryBites He redeemed himself by making Yorkies tonight 😊 https://t.co/IQe5GPrNAt

@MKS2009 Tbf, he knew he’d made a mistake before he served it when he realised he’d used cardamom instead of coriander seeds, which is what he meant to use. He knows the difference too, was obviously a momentary lapse in concentration. Maybe this will encourage him to try more often.

@AlimentaryBites Perhaps the flavours were not right this time but 100% for trying and for 100% for presentation! Don’t they say all the greats have to be creative to understand what works and what doesn’t? 😍😍😍

@AlimentaryBites A bit of help making the dinner would be a start up here!
We still love’em though don’t we…
